AddTagsToOnPremisesInstances.name: AddTagsToOnPremisesInstances
AddTagsToOnPremisesInstances.description: Add tags to one or more on-premises instances.

BatchGetApplicationRevisions.name: BatchGetApplicationRevisions
BatchGetApplicationRevisions.description: Gets information about one or more application revisions.

BatchGetApplications.name: BatchGetApplications
BatchGetApplications.description: Get information about multiple applications associated with the IAM user.

BatchGetDeploymentGroups.name: BatchGetDeploymentGroups
BatchGetDeploymentGroups.description: Get information about one or more deployment groups.

BatchGetDeploymentInstances.name: BatchGetDeploymentInstances
BatchGetDeploymentInstances.description: Gets information about one or more instance that are part of a deployment group.

BatchGetDeploymentTargets.name: BatchGetDeploymentTargets
BatchGetDeploymentTargets.description:
Returns an array of one or more targets associated with a deployment. This method
                                                works with all compute types and should be used instead of the deprecated BatchGetDeploymentInstances.
                                                The maximum number of targets that can be returned is 25.

BatchGetDeployments.name: BatchGetDeployments
BatchGetDeployments.description: Get information about multiple deployments associated with the IAM user.

BatchGetOnPremisesInstances.name: BatchGetOnPremisesInstances
BatchGetOnPremisesInstances.description: Get information about one or more on-premises instances.

ContinueDeployment.name: ContinueDeployment
ContinueDeployment.description:
Starts the process of rerouting traffic from instances in the original environment
                                                to instances in thereplacement environment without waiting for a specified wait time
                                                to elapse.

CreateApplication.name: CreateApplication
CreateApplication.description: Create an application associated with the IAM user.

CreateCloudFormationDeployment.name: CreateCloudFormationDeployment
CreateCloudFormationDeployment.description:
Create CloudFormation deployment to cooperate ochestration for a CloudFormation stack
                                                update.

CreateDeployment.name: CreateDeployment
CreateDeployment.description: Create a deployment for an application associated with the IAM user.

CreateDeploymentConfig.name: CreateDeploymentConfig
CreateDeploymentConfig.description: Create a custom deployment configuration associated with the IAM user.

CreateDeploymentGroup.name: CreateDeploymentGroup
CreateDeploymentGroup.description: Create a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user.

DeleteApplication.name: DeleteApplication
DeleteApplication.description: Delete an application associated with the IAM user.

DeleteDeploymentConfig.name: DeleteDeploymentConfig
DeleteDeploymentConfig.description: Delete a custom deployment configuration associated with the IAM user.

DeleteDeploymentGroup.name: DeleteDeploymentGroup
DeleteDeploymentGroup.description: Delete a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user.

DeleteResourcesByExternalId.name: DeleteResourcesByExternalId
DeleteResourcesByExternalId.description: Delete resources associated with the given external Id.

GetApplication.name: GetApplication
GetApplication.description: Get information about a single application associated with the IAM user.

GetApplicationRevision.name: GetApplicationRevision
GetApplicationRevision.description:
Get information about a single application revision for an application associated
                                                with the IAM user.

GetDeployment.name: GetDeployment
GetDeployment.description:
Get information about a single deployment to a deployment group for an application
                                                associated with the IAM user.

GetDeploymentConfig.name: GetDeploymentConfig
GetDeploymentConfig.description: Get information about a single deployment configuration associated with the IAM user.

GetDeploymentGroup.name: GetDeploymentGroup
GetDeploymentGroup.description:
Get information about a single deployment group for an application associated with
                                                the IAM user.

GetDeploymentInstance.name: GetDeploymentInstance
GetDeploymentInstance.description: Get information about a single instance in a deployment associated with the IAM user.

GetDeploymentTarget.name: GetDeploymentTarget
GetDeploymentTarget.description: Returns information about a deployment target.

GetOnPremisesInstance.name: GetOnPremisesInstance
GetOnPremisesInstance.description: Get information about a single on-premises instance.

ListApplicationRevisions.name: ListApplicationRevisions
ListApplicationRevisions.description:
Get information about all application revisions for an application associated with
                                                the IAM user.

ListApplications.name: ListApplications
ListApplications.description: Get information about all applications associated with the IAM user.

ListDeploymentConfigs.name: ListDeploymentConfigs
ListDeploymentConfigs.description: Get information about all deployment configurations associated with the IAM user.

ListDeploymentGroups.name: ListDeploymentGroups
ListDeploymentGroups.description:
Get information about all deployment groups for an application associated with the
                                                IAM user.

ListDeploymentInstances.name: ListDeploymentInstances
ListDeploymentInstances.description: Get information about all instances in a deployment associated with the IAM user.

ListDeploymentTargets.name: ListDeploymentTargets
ListDeploymentTargets.description: Returns an array of target IDs that are associated a deployment.

ListDeployments.name: ListDeployments
ListDeployments.description:
Get information about all deployments to a deployment group associated with the IAM
                                                user, or to get all deployments associated with the IAM user.

ListGitHubAccountTokenNames.name: ListGitHubAccountTokenNames
ListGitHubAccountTokenNames.description: Lists the names of stored connections to GitHub accounts.

ListOnPremisesInstances.name: ListOnPremisesInstances
ListOnPremisesInstances.description: Get a list of one or more on-premises instance names.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description:
Returns a list of tags for the resource identified by a specified ARN. Tags are used
                                                to organize and categorize your CodeDeploy resources.

PutLifecycleEventHookExecutionStatus.name: PutLifecycleEventHookExecutionStatus
PutLifecycleEventHookExecutionStatus.description:
Notify a lifecycle event hook execution status for associated deployment with the
                                                IAM user.

RegisterApplicationRevision.name: RegisterApplicationRevision
RegisterApplicationRevision.description:
Register information about an application revision for an application associated with
                                                the IAM user.

RemoveTagsFromOnPremisesInstances.name: RemoveTagsFromOnPremisesInstances
RemoveTagsFromOnPremisesInstances.description: Remove tags from one or more on-premises instances.

SkipWaitTimeForInstanceTermination.name: SkipWaitTimeForInstanceTermination
SkipWaitTimeForInstanceTermination.description:
In a blue/green deployment, overrides any specified wait time and starts terminating
                                                instances immediately after the traffic routing is complete.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description:
Associates the list of tags in the input Tags parameter with the resource identified
                                                by the ResourceArn input parameter.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description:
Disassociates a resource from a list of tags. The resource is identified by the ResourceArn
                                                input parameter. The tags are identfied by the list of keys in the TagKeys input parameter.

UpdateDeploymentGroup.name: UpdateDeploymentGroup
UpdateDeploymentGroup.description:
Change information about a single deployment group for an application associated with
                                                the IAM user.
